tools.title: Online Dev Tools
tools.subtitle: Useful utilities for developers and power users

list.title: Deeplink Tester
list.description: Test mobile app deeplinks and universal links easily.

list.title: Bcrypt Hash
list.description: Securely hash and verify strings using the bcrypt algorithm.

list.title: Text Diff
list.description: Compare two strings or code snippets to find differences.

list.title: Hash & Encode
list.description: Quickly generate MD5, SHA-256, and Base64 hashes/encodings.

list.title: JSON Formatter
list.description: Beautify, minify, and validate JSON data instantly.

list.title: Regex Checker
list.description: Test and debug regular expressions with real-time matching.

list.title: Timestamp Converter
list.description: Convert Unix timestamps to readable dates and vice versa with timezone support.

list.title: Case Converter
list.description: Convert text between camelCase, PascalCase, snake_case, and other formats.

list.title: Color Converter
list.description: Convert colors between HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV formats with live preview.

list.title: Snippet Sharer
list.description: Create and export beautiful code snippets with custom styles and syntax highlighting.

list.title: PDF Compressor
list.description: Compress PDF files directly in your browser without uploading them to any server.

list.title: Image Compressor
list.description: Optimize and compress PNG, JPG, and SVG images entirely in your browser.

list.title: Image Converter
list.description: Convert images between formats like PNG, JPG, WebP, and SVG to Raster.

list.title: Geo Tool
list.description: Digitize buildings, measure polygon areas, and manage KML/Shapefile data with high-res satellite views.
